value.name: Man shot by deputy in apparent 'suicide by cop' attempt back in court next week
value.description: A 26-year-old man shot by a Butler County Sheriff's deputy Monday in what Sheriff Richard Jones called an attempt to "commit suicide by cop" is scheduled to be in court Tuesday for a preliminary hearing.

value.name: Police ID man shot, injured in officer-involved shooting in Ross Township
value.description: In January, Junius Thomas III, 31, was killed during a SWAT standoff on Yoakum Court near Liberty Township. The Butler County Regional SWAT Team is made up of officers from different agencies ...

value.name: A list of those shot and killed by Cincinnati-area police since 2015
value.description: Officials said there was no video footage of the incident. Junius Thomas III, 31, of Liberty Township, was killed after a standoff with Butler County Regional SWAT team on Jan. 11, 2021.
